name: Axon Partners Group
overview:
Axon Partners Group is an international investment and consulting firm, committed to the creation of value in the broad technology sectors.

We work with high-level global investors, supporting early to growth capital funds of over 130 million USD, dedicated to technology and innovation.

Consulting services are offered to clients on all four continents, with a range of expert services including business strategy, operations and regulation and policy.

Axon was founded by a group of five partners who continue to take a directive role in all projects. The partners boast an outstanding level of experience and know-how, coupled with and exceptional aggregated track record in private equity, venture capital, consulting and corporate finance.

The Axon team is composed of a group of over thirty individuals who fine-tune their high-level experience and ability to suit each project. Entrepreneurial spirit, broad industrial knowledge, market access and a pro-active attitude come together to serve our investors, clients and invested companies.

Headquarted in Madrid, with offices in Miami, Bogotá and Bangalore (Associate office), and serving clients in Europe, Latin America, the Middle East, Africa and India, Axon prides itself on a truly international footprint.

funding_round.source_description: Akamon closes first round of investment at 2.8 million euros
